page.title: 17Life in Brixton.
page.content: I live in a block of flats called Colwall House on the Waltham Estate. My block of flats are near the shops, parks and my school.It takes me 5 minutes to get to school.My flats have 5 floors. I live on the 2nd floor.I hate living there because there are too many robbers and kidnappers. That is why my mum does not let me play out with others people,or go to school by myself. There are six rooms in my flat, 2 bedrooms,1 kitchen,1bathroom,1 toilet,1 sitting room. I have to share my bedroom with my sister. I have a balcony which is quite small. Soon we are going to move away.I have lots of friends living nearby but I do not play with them because they play far away and could get lost.My family come from Cyprus there is plenty of space there.
